website_summaries.verdict: Best for modern homes and tech-savvy owners.
pros: No need to get off the couch – fan responds to Alexa commands
Perfect for those who want the air circulation but don't need the additional light
cons: Makes some noise for the first 24-48 hours of use

customer_reviews.title: Great FAN--FIXED HORRIBLE HUM
customer_reviews.text: Great fan -- pushes a ton of air and looks amazing. Four stars because the company cheaped out on the rubber dampeners between the fan bracket and the fan box--caused a horrible hum for 3 months until I finally figured it out and unwired and dismounted the fan and replaced the cheap square rubber dampeners they gave me and put in some quality round thick ones I had left over from another fan installation last year (different brand). If you've got that loud hum that gets louder as you increase the speed I'm betting that is your problem as well. Hope this helps!!
customer_reviews.author: gkjake

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: It worked at the first click. It looks great and I love it. I also ordered a 36" rod (DR1536-DK Accessory - 36" Ceiling Fan Downrod With Wire And Connector), but it was a wrong model. This model requires DR536 (thread outside) instead of DR1536 (thread inside). There is no information given which one is the correct one.
customer_reviews.author: Hwaam Lee

customer_reviews.title: Beware of bad capacitors
customer_reviews.text: Great looking and works really well. BUT......My fan developed a humming sound after the first week of use. I talked to Minka and they said it was a faulty capacitor and instructed me to return it and order a new one. I ordered a second one and it developed the same issue. A third one is being inspected/tested by Minka and is on it's way but I am REALLY TIRED of installing and shipping back defective fans. What a hassle!!!! The third one arrived and right out of the box it had the same high hum on med speed. RTV and time to find a new fan from a new manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: TKS

customer_reviews.title: Motor Hums even on the lowest speed
customer_reviews.text: it has motor hum that seems to not bother other people (family & friends) but its the loudest hum of any of the 20 ceiling fans I own. It does seem that with dc motors the quiter fans require heavier (larger) motors -- this one has a lightweight motor so I was skeptical from the moment I started to install... sure enough as soon as it went on I took it down due to the motor hum.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and quiet.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and works great. We just had two installed yesterday and they are quiet and efficient. Would recommend. The installer was impress on the volume of air that the fan moves. I read reviews before we purchased. So glad I did. For the price theses are fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but click, click, click
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these. One without the light and the one with. The one without the light is in my living room just above the couch and it clicks...obnoxiously so. I had a licensed electrician install them this afternoon and it’s bugging me already. I’m hoping that eventually I’ll get used to the noise, but it’s soooooo annoying to be watching a movie and over every hearing the click click click noise. It’s too bad. I really wanted to love everything about it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Ewing

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing purchase
customer_reviews.text: I should have heeded the warning of all the customers that had negative experiences. The style is beautiful, but the fan constantly clicks as it spins. Since it's used in a bedroom, it's unbearable. I could handle the whirring noise but not the clicking (particularly at higher settings). Contemplated getting a replacement but it looks like it happened to people on multiple units that were sent to them. Not worth the risk or additional installation cost. Returning. Disappointed but relieved to not have to deal with this anymore. We have other brands installed and are going to go with them.
customer_reviews.author: ALS

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but terrible instructions
customer_reviews.text: This fan is gorgeous, however the instructions are terrible. A couple of tips. Put the unit on a pillow to install the blades. Also it comes with different screw and washer options with no explanation. Use the one that works for what you are mounting it to. I had to call the company and watch way too many videos to finally get this installed.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, moves the AIR!!
customer_reviews.text: All our friends love the fan's design, appearance and power. These fans really move air, we have (2) in our living room (16'x30'), and it moves the air every which direction better then any fans we used before. The blades cup design collects and sends that air out with so much force that high speed is often to much air movement. We now have it set for winter use and they really help with moving the woodstove's air every which way. Great buy, no regrets!!
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Extremely nice fan.  Beautiful and quiet.  Moves air well.
customer_reviews.text: I replaced an old, outdated, fan with the Minka-Aire F843-DK. Installation was relatively easy but took about an hour total. The appearance of the fan is very nice. The noise level is quieter than my old fan and much less than I expected as there are a few negative ratings on noise level. The blades push air in a comfortable manner on both low and medium. On high, air moves rapidly. The remote is simple and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Products!
customer_reviews.text: Had two Waves in Koa finish waiting for installation. Already had two Minka fans in bedrooms which we love. This company makes the best-looking, quietest and most wonderfully effective fans I've ever seen. An unsolicited but heartfelt opinion!
customer_reviews.author: SteveArcher

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH THE NOISE
customer_reviews.text: Really, really, really disappointed. The fan is shockingly noisy. At the slowest speed, on a dedicated circuit, in a room with 14' ceilings, its still so noisy that you can't leave it turned on without a ridiculously loud hum. Save your money - buy from another vendor. They look good, but not worth the noise they make. No response from Vendor either - another disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: dlj12345

customer_reviews.title: noisy, no customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought the fan for its looks, so I guess I can only blame myself, I suppose. There is a humming and clacking noise even at the lowest level. Two licensed electricians were consulted and they both blame the motor. One star extra because it does move air and looks nice. But the noise is super annoying. Emailed company, never heard back.
customer_reviews.author: vk25

customer_reviews.title: Very elegant good looking fan.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice good looking fan. I hire an electrician to install it for me. I think unless you know what you are doing. Otherwise always have professional to do the job. The fan is quiet and good looking. The only thing is the direction switch is on the unit not on the remote. But doesnt bother me much. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PROBLEM WITH CEILING FANS THEY ALL LOOK LIKE THEY SHOULD BE IN A LOG CABIN ..... NOT THIS 1
customer_reviews.text: PROBLEM WITH CEILING FANS THEY ALL LOOK LIKE THEY SHOULD BE IN A LOG CABIN ..... NOT THIS 1. THIS WILL BE MY 4TH PURCHASE 2 HERE IN FLORIDA OTHER 2 WAS IN A HOUSE I PERSONALLY SOLD ON MALIE ST. IN WAIKOLOA VILLAGE HAWAII. 1 OF THOSE HAD THE LIGHT AND IT TOOK AWAY FROM THE DESIGN BESIDES NOT BEING BRIGHT ENOUGH.
customer_reviews.author: Mark B. Land

customer_reviews.title: THe most beautiful fan and works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I say good morning to my fan every day. In a cathedral ceiling great room, it's practically the classiest thing in there. It works perfectly although the guy who installed it said it did not come with the right-color pipe thingie that hangs from the ceiling and he had to get a separate one from Lowes. My Minka is my first ceiling fan ever since moving from New England and I simply adore it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Rockefeller

customer_reviews.title: COOL FAN
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS FAN. It's sturdy, doesn't wobble. I did have to buy the longer rod, which I had hoped would be included but it didn't make me feel any differently about the purchase. It's such a pretty fan and because it's only 3 blades and they look like they are intertwined, it's even cooler. It has 3 settings and the remote control is an extra awesome thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Morales

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and Great looks, but motors hum
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for our large entertainment room. Love the look of these fans and they appear to be well constructed. Unfortunately they both have a fairly loud motor hum. I may keep them just because they are in an entertainment room where a TV or stereo is playing to help mask the hum most of the time when the room is in use. I would definitely not recommend these for use in a bedroom or other quiet location.
customer_reviews.author: JEM32712 - Apopka, FL

customer_reviews.title: Love the looks and it's effective at cooling the area right around it, though not my entire greatroom.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this fan! I got the koa finish one and just love how it looks. Extremely stylish! It's very quiet, too, and does a good job cooling the sitting area below it. It's centered above the living room half of my greatroom and I had hoped it would move air in the other half of the room, too, the dining/kitchen section of the room, but maybe that's too much to ask of any fan. My greatroom measures 12' x 24' overall, and this fan is centered over half of the room, meaning it cools a 12x12 area nicely.
customer_reviews.author: EZG

customer_reviews.title: Just okay, not great
customer_reviews.text: The problem, the didn’t take the time to dampen some of the parts and design which cause either the hum or rattling. It’s obvious and yet they didn’t engineer it with thought. I had to line the slide bell, which is decorative with adhesive felt and then tape the cotter pin that rattled.
customer_reviews.author: Yes

customer_reviews.title: Just not happy with the manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fan after wanting one for a while. After getting to the finishing part of the install, I discovered that because our junction box was slightly recessed in ceiling, the screws securing the canopy to the hanger ball were 1/4" too short. After searching locally for a screw that would work and even trying the machine one, I called the Minka-Aire and asked if they had any longer screws. No luck. Surely they've had this problem before?? Now I have to hope some glue will finish the job. I can't blame the retailer.Just not happy with the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: rebewhit

customer_reviews.title: There is a hum
customer_reviews.text: I like the fan, it looks nice and operates well. This IS a low "hum" noise from the motor. The noise becomes louder as the fan speed increases, fortunately I usually run the fan at low speed, where the hum noise is barely noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: BPL

customer_reviews.title: Works great & quiet.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. My husband was able to install it easily. When I purchased, there was some debate about whether or not it was Koa wood. I definitely don't think it is Koa wood, as I could see areas on the inside that the stain missed that looked much more like a resin composite / high grade plastic than wood. But I don't really care, it looks just like wood when installed and works beautifully. It is also super quiet. We have gotten lots of compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Clinton S.

customer_reviews.title: This is my 3rd Minka fan of this model. ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd Minka fan of this model. The problem is it wobbles at medium speed. The other two fans run flawlessly. There is no way to balance the fan. Minka states that the blades are weight matched but it may still wobble. Unfortunately this fan is in our living room and gets the most use.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Love the total wood look and surprising air movement with this fan. The motor is totally hidden within the wooden hub formed by the blades. The remote is simple to use, allowing directional change and three speeds.
customer_reviews.author: Tranquillette

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for our living areas last year during a major home renovation. I wanted to replace the existing fan in our master br but budget was on overdrive and skipped it. Alas, the Master BR fan died and I happily purchased another one of these from Amazon. LOVE them. The only problem I had was isolating the remotes. The remotes have a great relay but I struggled to isolate the bedroom from the living room. Finally achieved it after much fiddling. Worth every minute of the minor trouble. Quiet and a beautiful combination of contemporary and rustic. Looks so cool with our contemporary zen decor.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love the look of this fan
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the look of this fan. Easy install with one person as it hangs from a support that is installed first. Modern yet classic look with the wood. Using with a GE smart fan control and is working well with Alexa and Smart things to turn on and off without leaving bed!
customer_reviews.author: B. K.

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful fan! It is even better in person!
customer_reviews.text: This is advertised as 52" and we were worried about it being too big for our bedroom, however, I called the seller and she advised me that is is not as big as advertised. It is perfect for our room and only about 42". We are looking to buy for our other rooms from this seller. We are so very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking modern ceiling fan
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Easy install. Don't bother with 3" down rod - doesn't fit. Installed with 6" down rod. It looks like real Koa wood. Just know it is not. Others said it was shiny and fake looking- we didn't feel that way when we took it out of box. Looks very nice in room and moves a lot of air. The only weird thing which doesn't bother us is you have to use a switch on fan to change direction of blades. Not a problem for us as we will only do that twice a year Very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional!
customer_reviews.text: My contractors installed this fan in my sewing room which is over 18' long and about 12'wide. They loved the uniqueness of the fan but said it was like assembling a jig-saw puzzle. It's beautiful and circulates the air well.
customer_reviews.author: dixiepeach

customer_reviews.title: Looks amazing and the breeze is strong
customer_reviews.text: Great and absolutely beautiful unit. Not sure why the receiver is so large, but it all fits fine. The unit is very quiet with the exception of a little "buzz" when you change settings. It's really smooth and gives off a lot breeze even on the lowest setting. Can't wait to feel cool during the summers.
customer_reviews.author: Indianac

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly beautiful fan that works very well
customer_reviews.text: We have a high-priced condo in Maui we rent out, and everyone comments about how beautiful this fan is. In addition it works very well in all respects. So we also bought one for our home in California.
customer_reviews.author: Tom S

customer_reviews.title: Swoon! So beautiful. Love it. Quiet with plenty of power.
customer_reviews.text: In our master bedroom. We got the one with no light and used the 6 inch down rod option, which came included. I ordered the 4 inch option, but found that it looked too close to the ceiling for us. Gorgeous, quiet fan. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Keesters

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, silent, and effective
customer_reviews.text: This fan is beautiful and is silent while operating. I even got the 36” down rod and it still operates like a dream. So beautiful, easy install and moves air well. I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: “Fan”tastic
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful. So unique. Only wish remote would reverse, but still a solid five stars. Solid and no movement even when at top speed. Kudos to the designers!
customer_reviews.author: James Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet operation
customer_reviews.text: I got this fan a while ago. Some hardware was missing and customer support was great on that. They replaced the whole purchase very quickly and painless. Just had it to install in the bedroom a day ago. The fan is extremely quiet. Also, it is very attractive design. Of course, it matches my bedroom colors perfecly; otherwise, I wouldn't get it. Good purchase for me. 👍
customer_reviews.author: belona

customer_reviews.title: Out of two purchased, one has defective motor
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these fans for new home construction. One works great. Very quiet and stable. The other one has an annoying hum in the motor. I'm past the return/replace date, so I guess I'm stuck having to purchase a replacement. It's a bummer to buy things that won't get installed for many months only to find them defective. On the up side, these are beautiful fans. The contractor thought they were really pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Jogart T.

customer_reviews.title: It was easy for my electrician to install.
customer_reviews.text: Low speed very quite and moves plenty air. Higher speeds not at all noisy for the amount of air they move.
customer_reviews.author: james p phillips

customer_reviews.title: It's right above our bed and it's super quite
customer_reviews.text: Wow my wife and I really do like the fan. It's not real wood but really does look just like it. It's right above our bed and it's super quite. The remote control is really cool too. It would be super cool if it worked with the Lutron system, but you can't have everything. I highly recommend the fan and you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: PkScott

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and attractive
customer_reviews.text: Second one I bought, it looks awesome, can't hear it running, and it literally took me 20 minutes to install.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: I love this fan!!!
customer_reviews.text: I selected this particular ceiling fan because I liked the design. It works perfectly, but my favorite part is still it's beauty. Yes, it's beauty. This is a beautiful ceiling fan. It almost looks like a piece of sculpture. Even the guy who installed it commented on how beautifully designed it is. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna Uribes

customer_reviews.title: I really like it and could afford it
customer_reviews.text: I saw this at Home Depot for twice the money, though I know that this is a cheap knock off... hey... I really like it and could afford it. It's not wood like the other one... but it's up on my ceiling and really puts a nice breeze in the room! It makes a tiny little click noise, may be the installation, but looks absolutely fabulous. This hot summer I ran it for days at a time... so grateful for it!!
customer_reviews.author: RubyS

customer_reviews.title: Superior Design and Unique Look
customer_reviews.text: For my purpose in a Florida bedroom with a ten foot ceiling this fan is awesome. It has a very cool look, it moves air very well even on low speed, and so far no issues with cavitation noise. I think the design reduces the likelihood of noise since the blade attachment is so unique. The remote is kind of useless for me with no light kit since I can't imagine needing to turn the fan on high ( it blows the doors off) and you can't reverse direction via remote.
customer_reviews.author: Terry S.

customer_reviews.title: High quality, quiet
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, very quiet, easy to install, looks great. Wish I had ordered bigger (larger diameter) model!
customer_reviews.author: Dan in NJ

customer_reviews.title: Cool looking fan BUT!!!! in less than 6 months it's noisy
customer_reviews.text: It's a cool design but it's start rattling less than 8 months later. It's annoying, for anyone in the room.
customer_reviews.author: JupiterG

customer_reviews.title: Love the sleek design!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. I like that it doesn't have the light kit. I didn't have an electrical box in the ceiling, so very glad it came with a remote and a remote holder that mounts to the wall for easy finding. We tapped into an electrical box in the attic. LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Lortz

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and it's quiet
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful fan. Installation was straight forward and the remote works well. It does not move as much air as some have suggested, though. We have it in a large room and the high setting is all we use. If a longer post were available we would have used it, but we received only two short posts.
customer_reviews.author: Race Coach

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fan
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish, blades are big enough to provide good room circulation. The downrod is pretty short, so be aware you may need one if you have tall ceilings. This is a beautiful piece, appears to be good quality, and quiet.
customer_reviews.author: T. Mathew

customer_reviews.title: It has been up for 2 weeks and so far we are extremely pleased! As others have mentioned
customer_reviews.text: Quiet and moves a lot of air! I am a little confused that the number of cfm don't seem to match....but trusted in the fact that it was energy star rated to be extremely efficient. It has been up for 2 weeks and so far we are extremely pleased! As others have mentioned...it has quite a different look. Friends who have seen it are captivated by it! I did not buy it with the lighting option as that was not necessary in the room we placed it in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and stylish ...
customer_reviews.text: This is such a lovely fan! It looks great and works even better. It is really unique because it looks like dark wood but is only plastic. It's not easy to install and our remote was broken, but we bought a multi-speed wall switch for it, which works even better. I think most ceiling fans in this price range are tacky looking but this one is sleek and stylish. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS FAN.
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous to look at and pushes a lot of air.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Walter

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Exceptional quality. Installed as a replacement fan for old one with easy install. This is second one I have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Squeaking Already
customer_reviews.text: At first I loved this fan, as it is sleek and stylish. Unfortunately after about four months of intermittent use, I noticed it started making an annoying noise. I have another one in the kitchen that has the light and so far it is quiet. The same person installed both.
customer_reviews.author: A. Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Unique fan that looks great
customer_reviews.text: Saw this fan in a friend's home and loved it. Came home and ordered it and installed it on a 12-foot ceiling. Got a little confused with the remote, but it was operator error. Love the look and it works great and quietly. I also ordered the style with the light and am pleased with that one, also.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love. It is slightly unusual, (the electrician had never seen on like it,) and masculine looking enough in the area I needed it for, but could be dressed up in another style. Very versatile. It is quiet, and really cools the area nicely. If you like the way it looks in the picture, you won't be disappointed. Also, it arrived MUCH faster than I expected. No nonsense company.
customer_reviews.author: ParisHughes

customer_reviews.title: I’m a repeat customer
customer_reviews.text: These fans are attractive, quiet and effective. I’ve got one in each of my three rooms, installed by an electrician.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Fans
customer_reviews.text: These fans are great! We get compliments all the time on them because they don't look like any of the regular fans at the big chain hardware stores. They move plenty of air, and we've had them for almost two years now. Still very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Beauty and Function
customer_reviews.text: Silent operation and just beautifully simple to look at, a great design.
customer_reviews.author: cflanders

customer_reviews.title: This fan is beautiful’
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful fan-and it looks amazing in our rustic mountain home!
customer_reviews.author: Annah S.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT! Just beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This fixture was a last minute decision to try a more 'artistic' look. LOVE IT! Just beautiful. Ignore the criticism about it not being made of wood. You would literally have to stand on a ladder and break a blade in half to tell what this is made of. The appearance is beautiful and unique and everyone that enters my house thinks it's wood.
customer_reviews.author: Rochester reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommeded
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a fan of writing reviews, but this fan is worth the 30 seconds. It's installed fairly easy, is very quiet, and pushes a lot of air. It's not a boring typical fan which is exactly what I wanted. It matches my antique wood furniture like a champ. And then he remote is nice. I mounted the remote holder next to the light switch, so I won't lose it.
customer_reviews.author: Sean K

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful addition
customer_reviews.text: This fan is so pretty and it puts out a great amount of wind. It's a great addition to our living room.
customer_reviews.author: AngelinaVP

customer_reviews.title: very unique, get lots of compliments
customer_reviews.text: This actually pulls more air down then traditional five paddle fans, IMHO. We love it and so do our guests.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Move air with style.
customer_reviews.text: This is our 2nd Minka Air fan. I find the run-of-the-mill fans boring. Minka Air produces interesting and creative versions of a basic ceiling fan! It also moves the air nicely! :)
customer_reviews.author: heidi diehl

customer_reviews.title: And despite its beautiful design, it works better than a fan with ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an elegant, artistically-designed fan. It is a focal point in our sunroom. And despite its beautiful design, it works better than a fan with 5 blades! We also love the remote control feature!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry A. Clapper

customer_reviews.title: Where's the air!
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would put out more air according to the specs. Very little breeze if that. Dissapointed
customer_reviews.author: Willee

customer_reviews.title: Love the design, not the humming noise.
customer_reviews.text: Love the design, the airflow (I don't like the continuous air flow of most ceiling fans - this feels very natural). However, it does make an odd humming noise. It's too bad, otherwise it would be 5 stars for sure.
customer_reviews.author: leveeguy

customer_reviews.title: Nice fan, I wish the manufacturer would provide replacement parts
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the look of this fan and bought one, unfortunately dropped the motor unit when installing and bent a very small part that was easily disassembled. I contacted the manufacturer to replace the bent part only to be told they don't replace "that part." Had to buy a whole new fan for what should've been a $5 or $10 part replacement. Second install went better, I am using an Insteon FanLinc controller for the fan rather than the included remote (part of my home automation), works great. As another reviewer noted, it does not move a lot of air, but the looks make up for it.
customer_reviews.author: daveslc

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I'm an interior designer and have been using these in a couple different houses. They're great. Beautiful to look at without paying an arm and a leg
customer_reviews.author: Greg Doherty

customer_reviews.title: Love this fan
customer_reviews.text: Love this fan! We bought three. Two with lights, for bedroom & living room, and one without a light for the kitchen. They are smooth, slick looking, and extremely quiet, as they move the air gently through the room! Love, love, love them! It is so nice in the bedroom, we keep it on low every night, and it makes ZERO NOISE! I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Teri Barker

customer_reviews.title: Works and looks great
customer_reviews.text: The fan works well and it was easy to install. the only complaint I have is that they need to sell the rod extensions with the fan. Also the 2 different size extensions (3" and 6") should screw together to get you at least 9" on the rod length. All that said the fan looks great and I plan on buying another
customer_reviews.author: Susan O

customer_reviews.title: Too Loud for a Bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, easy to install, good price at $200. Moves a moderate, but very acceptable amount of air. But, not so quiet. It's too loud for a bedroom fan. The motor is way to loud and it was worse when it was at lower speeds.
customer_reviews.author: Wicked Man

customer_reviews.title: Looks lovely and last a long time
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 3 years 😭 good bye old friend Ok I was wrong, it's still alive needed new receiver
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Really attractive.
customer_reviews.text: So many compliments on these, they look really really cool! No complaints about their function, either. Whisper quiet, but had them professionally installed.
customer_reviews.author: S Zaretsky

customer_reviews.title: Great design. It's quiet on low and med
customer_reviews.text: Great design. It's quiet on low and med. Moves almost as much air as it's replacement, 52" four bladed hunter. From ten feet away the Minka Aire F843-DK looks like cheap shinny plastic. I'm a carpenter I took off one star because of the plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Steve E. Hendry

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT
customer_reviews.text: This fan is all that I had hoped for. Looks beautiful and moves alot of air. Excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: pt

customer_reviews.title: A good looking fan
customer_reviews.text: A good looking fan. The wood grain detail is not quite as nice as in the photo, but it looks good enough. Has three speeds, moves lots of air directly under the fan, but not so much over a wide area. There is a slightly noticeable engine hum on the highest setting, but not too bad. Still a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: NJ

customer_reviews.title: These fans look great and get a boatload of comments from our visitors
customer_reviews.text: These fans look great and get a boatload of comments from our visitors. They hang high on our ceiling and still produce a good amount of circulation. If you install two of them, be sure to change the setting so that you can control each separately.
customer_reviews.author: Susi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and quiet ceiling fan! We definitely recommend this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Rich M.

customer_reviews.title: Does not work !!!
customer_reviews.text: This fan is pretty but it does not work. Now I have to return it. Electrician checked that the wiring was all correct going into the fan, but nothing happened when you turned it on. Very disappointing!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Love the fan
customer_reviews.text: We’ve only had the fan up for two weeks, but so far we live it. It has three speeds, moves plenty of air around, and cane as described. We are happy With our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey B.

customer_reviews.title: Fun Style. My wife doesn't like ceiling fans and ...
customer_reviews.text: Fun Style. My wife doesn't like ceiling fans and she wants another one of these.
customer_reviews.author: KCB

customer_reviews.title: Great fan, but developed noise
customer_reviews.text: Great fan, but after a few months it's developed a light noise related to rotation. The noise can only be heard in a really quiet room - unfortunately, that's exactly what you have when you're sleeping. Tick, tick, tick, tick,...
customer_reviews.author: David Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Love it Love it!  Very unique!
customer_reviews.text: This is in my new sunroom.......the architect, contractor and everyone else loves it since it is unique. The electrician said the motors are super on the MinkAire fans
customer_reviews.author: Lady Ann

customer_reviews.title: Form & Function
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful creation combining form and funciton. Easy to put together and hang. I just wonder why it took so long to reinvent the ceiling fan?! Quality materials, product. I'll be hanging more of these in my subtropical climate. Now, for the test of standing up over time.
customer_reviews.author: stillactive

customer_reviews.title: Main rod was bent
customer_reviews.text: The main rod of the fan was bent, so it wobbles badly. Unfortunately, I couldn't have it installed until after the return window. So I'm stuck with a beautiful but non-functional fan.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah4656

customer_reviews.title: Fan worked for 1 week. BS
customer_reviews.text: Had fan installed by certified electrician. Fan worked well for 1 week. Only used remote to turn the fan off and on and only used low and medium settings. Today fan is shutting off after running for a minute or so. NOT HAPPY. WILL CALL AMAZON TOMORROW..
customer_reviews.author: John DiFranks

customer_reviews.title: An excellent fan which we wish would move a tad more ...
customer_reviews.text: An excellent fan which we wish would move a tad more air. It does a very nice job, and is well worth the price. But with no AC in the house, we wish it moved a tad more air. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: ngoshawk

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Simple, easy install. Silent. Beautiful. Redid a room down to the studs. Laid gorgeous bamboo flooring, real stone floor to ceiling fireplace, and a glass wall overlooking a lake, but the first thing everyone comments on are these fans.
customer_reviews.author: villapoo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fan!
customer_reviews.text: Looks amazing! Lots of compliments from guests. And works really well.
customer_reviews.author: JdA

customer_reviews.title: installation was simple and the fan looks great. You can see how it was used on ...
customer_reviews.text: This ceiling fan fit perfectly in our Tiny Home living room. We have a shed roof so we had to build a small box for the ceiling mount to fit well but other than that, installation was simple and the fan looks great. You can see how it was used on our Youtube page under Alpine Tiny Homes.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Third Minka fan! I have purchased three of these and they are gorgeous! They look stunning when off and move tons of air when on! So pretty and functional!
customer_reviews.author: alice

customer_reviews.title: elegant fan
customer_reviews.text: Elegant solution for high cathedral ceilings in living /dining/family space. Lots of favorable comments! They look great and so far (a few weeks in) are working great, too.
customer_reviews.author: NoCo Lady

customer_reviews.title: Get this fan .. I'm very happy!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want this model ... But got it ...man I'm glad I did .. looks great and is really silent .. easy to install
customer_reviews.author: John W.

customer_reviews.title: It’s works really well while being stylish.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a 3 blade fan. I love the style of this one. It moves air really well. I get a lot of comments on it - people like it.
customer_reviews.author: EMH

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: The fan moves a large amount of air and looks like real wood even though it is made of a plastic material. Very quiet and works well in my 13' x 24' room. I have received many compliments on the stunning looks of the fan. Simple lines with great fit and finish.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is great! Looks beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is great! Looks beautiful, many compliments and really puts out the air. It truly is brown so not sure what the other comment said about red? I would highly recommend this fan
customer_reviews.author: sueann

customer_reviews.title: They not only look good but keep the house fairly cool
customer_reviews.text: Everyone that comes to my home comments on the fans and ask where I got them. They not only look good but keep the house fairly cool. A metal fan might be more powerful but definitely would not look as good.
customer_reviews.author: Esther

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fan
customer_reviews.text: This is my second fan. Beautiful to look at, works nice and quiet too. Only complaint is their remote receiver is big an gnarly which makes it hard to hid inside. I hope they change that. Other than that its easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Alasdair Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: Nice fan
customer_reviews.text: Love the design of this fan, works well, easy to assemble and looks great. Many compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Snegon

product_meta.title: Minka-Aire F843-DK Protruding Mount, 3 Distressed Koa Blades, Smart Ceiling fan, Brown
feature_bullets: Designed with a distressed koa body, this indoor ceiling fan was crafted with Three Distressed Koa Blades
Control included: RCS213 - Three-speed hand-held remote with full-range light dimming. Non-reversing (manual reverse switch on motor)
Dimensions: Measures 13.5' from the ceiling to the bottom of the fan. This Contemporary Ceiling Fan has a blade sweep diameter of 52' with 48° Blade Pitch
Includes a 6" Downrod and Angled Ceiling Adapter. Can be mounted up to 21° with included adapter. Use A245-DK (sold separately) for ceilings angled 21° to 45°
Minka Aire Fan, Not Light Kit Compatible

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars359 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
